component.name: EnrichmentScores
component.doc: It receives two set of motifs: the de novo motifs, and the databse motifs. For each of these motifs, it fits the parameters background prior and beta. Using the fitted parameters, it calculates the average and sd enrichment scores for each of the motifs. Final result is a file that its line holds the value of prior, beta, mean enrichment score, and standard deviation enrichment score for each motif.
